reference.title: apiMap
reference.shortdesc: The <apiMap> element provides the name of the application programming interface (API) reference and all the elements necessary to describe the package, or set of packages, and its components.

section.title: Description
section.p: The containing element for a map is the <apiMap> element that can contain the title and id attributes. In the <apiMap> element, use the <apiPackageRef>, <topicmeta> and <reltable> sub elements to add and organize references to the topics.
